resources.string: Disabling the status bar blocks notifications and quick settings.
Specifies if a user is disallowed from enabling or accessing debugging features.
Are you sure you want to exit DPC mode?
"Will offers system-level device management capabilities through the InnoService SDK."

Innocomm DPC(Device Policy Controller) is an Innocomm enterprise deployment. A DPC app,which is a work policy controller, controls local device policies and system applications on devices through InnoService SDK.

Hide or unhide packages. When a package is hidden it is unavailable for use, but the data and actual package file remain. Impact List:
 com.android.email
 com.android.music
 com.android.phone
 com.android.browser
 com.android.mms
 com.android.calendar
 com.android.contacts
 com.android.gallery3d
 com.android.dialer
 com.android.deskclock
 com.android.quicksearchbox
 com.android.documentsui
To set whether the screen capture is disabled. Disabling screen capture also prevents the content from being shown on display devices that do not have a secure video output.
This setting is disabled by your administrator. Contact mori.lin@innocomm.com
The device is managed by your administrator. Contact mori.lin@innocomm.com
Clear application user data of a given package. The behaviour of this is equivalent to the target application calling [ActivityManager#clearApplicationUserData()].
Are you sure you want to clear %s?
Installs the given certificate as a user CA.
Install CA successfully. Please check it in \nSettins > Security > Encryption & credentials > Trusted credential.
Install CA failed. Please check you CA file.
Get the MAC address of the Wi-Fi device.
Set whether bluetooth devices can access enterprise contacts.
Sets the device owner information to be shown on the lock screen.
The device is managed by Innocomm DPC.
Install a system update from the given file.
Reboot the device. If there is an ongoing call on the device.
Are you shure you want to reboot the device?
Request a bugreport. Will locate in /data/user_de/0/com.android.shell/files/bugreports
Force set a new device unlock password. This takes effect immediately.
Will perform a device wipe after too many incorrect device-unlock passwords have been entered.
Ask that all user data be wiped.
Are you sure you want to wipe the data?
Set the master volume mute on or off.
Set the system wall clock time.
Set the system\'s persistent default time zone.
